name: botbuilder-toybox-dialogs
author: stevenic@microsoft.com
description: Extension for Bot Builder v4 that adds a dialog stack based system for managing conversation flow in a bot.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-toybox-dialogs --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\docs\botbuilder-toybox-dialogs .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder Toybox - Dialogs" --readme none
